attributes.action: Disabled Access to Nailsea & Backwell Station
attributes.additional_details:
Station Operator, First Great Western, was granted £1.23m in December 2011 by the Department for Transport under the 'Access for All' scheme on condition that the work was to be completed by end of March 2014.
FGW failed to start the work and the funding deadline was missed. Funding has now been withdrawn.
FGW should be held to account for not using the available funding and forced to undertake the work to fulfil their obligations under the Equality Act 2010
